Mineralization paradox | SMB survival |P leaching-UK | P leaching-China | P-Africa | Tillage | Compost

Lorette is working as Scientific Assistant on the project 'the survival strategy of the soil microbial biomass'. She first came to Rothamsted as an undergraduate student from Poitiers for work experience. She returned after this for a series of casual contracts, and started in her current role in this group in November 2005.
